useCase.name: Display Rooms List of an EnergyGrid

mainSequence.step: Admin displays rooms list of an EnergyGrid in the MainUI
MainUI displays rooms list of an EnergyGrid in the HouseConfigurationUI
Admin requests Geographic Area Name
Admin inserts data (Geographic Area name) in the MainUI
MainUI sets data (Geographic Area name) in the HouseConfigurationUI
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in the list
GeographicAreaList checks if name is contained in the list
GeographicArea matches the name
GeographicArea validates the data
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (Geographic Area)
Admin requests House Name
Admin inserts data (House name) in the MainUI
MainUI sets data (House name) in the HouseConfigurationUI
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in the list
HouseList checks if name is contained in the list
House matches the name
House validates the data
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (House)
Admin requests Energy Grid Name
Admin inserts data (Energy Grid Name) in the MainUI
MainUI sets data (Energy Grid Name) in the HouseConfigurationUI
HouseConfigurationController checks if name is contained in the list
EnergyGridList checks if name is contained in the list
EnergyGrid matches the name
EnergyGrid validates the data
HouseConfigurationUI sets data (EnergyGrid)
HouseConfigurationController gets data from EnergyGrid (Room list)
EnergyGrid gets RoomList
RoomList validates data and builds String
HouseConfigurationUI displays list of rooms of the EnergyGrid to Admin
